feed.title: Gathio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gathio: v1.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Layout tweaks and little fixes by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/136
  • Updated dependencies

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

entry.title: New release for Gathio: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add docs using MkDocs by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/137
  • Update README.md by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/139
  • Minor patches by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/142
  • Unattend events from RSVP email by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/146
  • Style overhaul by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/138
  • Fix URL validation by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/153
  • Improve event lists by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/154
  • Allow self-signed certs for SMTP server by @HybridSarcasm in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/163
  • Docker volume for 'events' folder by @HybridSarcasm in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/162

New Contributors

  • @HybridSarcasm made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/163

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/compare/v1.4.1...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Gathio: v1.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Publish container to GHCR by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/166
  • Switch to deploy via Docker Compose by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/167
  • Change wiki links to new docs site. by @andypiper in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/172
  • nodemailer: Add support for no-auth and fix from address by @ovv in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/177
  • Upgrade upload-artifact and download-artifact to v4 by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/188
  • Change to BCC for group emailing by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/187
  • Update docs and Docker Compose config by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/189
  • remove Google Fonts dependency by @alifeee in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/185
  • add a bit more info to installation instructions by @alifeee in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/186
  • Fix SMTP auth by @wjbolles in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/195

New Contributors

  • @andypiper made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/172
  • @ovv made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/177
  • @alifeee made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/185
  • @wjbolles made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/195

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1

entry.title: New release for Gathio: v1.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow url with config information for nodemailer by @halkeye in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/200
  • fix #197 by running through npm so version env is set by @halkeye in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/199
  • Switch donations card to GitHub Sponsors, remove deploy workflow by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/201
  • Fix ReferenceError: nodemailerTransporter is not defined by @halkeye in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/202

New Contributors

  • @halkeye made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/200

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/compare/v1.5.1...v1.5.2

entry.title: New release for Gathio: v1.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Localization, again by @dinoue in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/198
  • Add Mailgun email service by @lowercasename in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/210

New Contributors

  • @dinoue made their first contribution in https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/pull/198

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lowercasename/gathio/compare/v1.5.2...v1.6.0
